Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Cicero
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Cicero, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Cicero, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Washington
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Washington due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Washington due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
